Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,591Chapters: 3/15Kudos: 34

Summary: Buck goes back to the 118 after the lawsuit. The team forgives him and work feels normal again. But outside the firehouse, no one invites him out. Buck feels lonely. entry.title: Buckley's Chance
entry.summary:
Author: RaspberryDreams1

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,269Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 345

Summary: Evan knows that wish babies are extremely rare, the Fae only grant a handful of wishes per year and almost never to single parents. But Evan so desperately wants a family to love that he’s been subconsciously wishing since he was a teenager. Eddie hadn’t thought of wishing for a baby, he had barely heard of wish babies or soulmates, his parents didn’t believe in such things. Eddie desperately wanted a place for him and his son to belong, a family that would accept him without demanding that he change who he was to fit their impossibly unrealistic expectations.

entry.title: Things We Don't Say
entry.summary:
Author: Ifallinlovewithfictionalboys

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 106,419Chapters: 16/23Kudos: 58

Summary: “What are you doing? You have to keep moving.”   “I never told you I’m from LA.”   Dr. Sol’s eyes widen, and he takes a step back.   “Howard–”   “Don’t.” He lets out an animaltic growl, “Don’t say anything unless it’s to explain what the hell is going on and why there is a Korean gang looking for me.”   “Mafia.” Dr. Sol corrects, “I don’t know what they want from you, I just know of them. Now please, you must go back to L.A. Your pack needs you.”  ---After seven months of being presumed dead, Buck comes back and finally reunites with his family.Now that he’s back, Buck makes it his mission to change things along the way. It’s easier than ever now that his pack knows the truth — or so he thought. Apparently, a supernatural world can make a world of a difference, and new threats are coming out of the shadows.It doesn’t help that he feels like he’s constantly forgetting something, or that Chimney is hiding secrets of his own.—PLEASE NOTE: This is part of a series, and will likely not make any sense as a stand alone.

entry.title: The Ghost of You
entry.summary:
Author: bvddiebro

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 109,109Chapters: 19/21Kudos: 1,130

Summary: Evan "Buck" Buckley thought he had left his past behind when he traded his Navy fatigues for turnouts. For years, he’s buried the memories—of war zones, of a lost lover, of the life he swore he'd never return to. But with a series of arson attacks across LA, his past comes back to haunt him.NCIS are called to investigate and Buck’s carefully constructed web of secrets begins to crack when Sam Hanna arrives at Station 118—because Buck knows him. Sam was once his teammate, his mentor, his brother.When a grainy surveillance video reveals a face Buck thought he’d never see again, the ground shifts beneath his feet. Zack, the man he mourned, the man he watched die, is alive.Working alongside NCIS and his old SEAL Team, Buck finds himself walking a dangerous tightrope. The deeper he gets, the more he risks everything—his job, his family, his friendships and the life he’s built with Eddie and Christopher.But secrets can’t stay buried forever.

entry.title: The Family he made
entry.summary:
Author: AliciaSteinke15

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 214,199Chapters: 58/?Kudos: 942

Summary: When Buck left the Navy Seals he went to Chicago and became a firefighter. While in Chicago, Buck started at FireHouse 51 where he met Kelly Severide and fell in love with him. Two years after asking out Severide, Andy Darden dies and Kelly gets hurt and goes off the deep end but they get through it. A lot happened Buck and Kelly got married but when Shay dies everything changes. Kelly goes off the deep end again but it's worse this time. Buck tries to help but Kelly keeps pushing him away so one day Buck goes to Cheif Wallace Boden and asked to be transferred to another station in LA. When he tells Kelly to see if he will stop him, he doesn't. Kelly lets the love of his life and husband walk out the door with his wedding ring in Kelly's hand. When Buck gets to LA he joins FireHouse 118 and changes himself.This is the Story of how Evan "Buck" Buckley-Severide became Evan "Buck" Buckley

entry.title: A soulmate who wasn't meant to be
entry.summary:
Author: JamieNimbus

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,974Chapters: 5/10Kudos: 12

Summary: When his abuela and tía Pepa suggested taking him and his sisters on vacation with their cousins the last place he expected them to end up was Hershey, PA. Sure, the cold and snow was a nice change to the blistering heat and desert that came from El Paso but seriously? This place was a ghost town. Or the one where Eddie is allowed to finally act like a dumb kid and not a parent. A mysterious pretty boy helps him realise things about himself.

entry.title: Nobody’s Son
entry.summary:
Author: Temptedtantrum

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,072Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: It’s 8:38 pm in California and Bobby Nash is dead. Bobby Nash, the man who was Evan’s surrogate father. Tommy’s realized since the break up that he didn’t fully understand Evan, but he did know some of him, at least. He’s always known this. He’s always know the way Evan looked up to Bobby, admired him, and went to him for advice. He knows the specific way that Evan doesn’t talk to his biological father, at least not more than a few passing words under the guise of niceties.Tommy watches Evan break down on the security camera and knows what he has to do next. He’ll give himself two more minutes and then he’ll do it. Two minutes to pretend that he’s the one Evan needs, that he can be the one who gets him through this. But he’s not, and he can’t.At 9:40 pm in El Paso, Eddie’s phone rings.~~~~~Or, Tommy calls Eddie and tells him to get his ass to LA. Everything changes. (Was originally going to be Buddie but I started redeeming Tommy for plot reasons and I think it’s a why choose now. Idk. I’ll update tags as appropriate

entry.summary:
Author: Buddiefan95
